name: Prince of Persia: The Forgotten Sands (DS)
name_original: Prince of Persia: The Forgotten Sands (DS)
description:
Prince of Persia: The Forgotten Sands (DS) is a platformer game developed by Ubisoft Montreal. It came out on 18-05-2010. It was published by Ubisoft Entertainment. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
You can play Prince of Persia: The Forgotten Sands (DS) on Nintendo DS.
